resources.string: This app requires the following permissions:\nMonitor your activity: Required for all accessibility services.\nSimulate touch actions: Perform automatic touch operations. Rest assured that this app does not collect personal information. Thank you for your support, enjoy using it.
Click repeatedly at the same position at specified intervals
Set up a series of clicks or swipes at multiple positions
Set click actions at multiple positions to synchronize clicks
Perform the steps you want to perform directly on the screen and target actions will be added automatically.
Set an action at the specified position, it will always perform a press and hold operation
By changing the direction of the touch, you can make it touch anywhere on the screen.
Your saved scripts will be displayed here
Hide floating window to screen edge
How many times to repeat this action
We use Accessibility Services API to implement the main functions of the application

1. Why use this service?
 We use this method to implement basic functions such as clicking and flexibility. 
2. Do we collect private data?
 We will not collect any personal data in this way. If you agree to use them, please click the accept button and continue
Required permissions to run this app.
This app needs to activate accessibility service permission before it can be used normally, please click Settings, then find this app in the accessibility list or in other downloaded services:

If the app is not available, you can turn off the accessibility service and turn it back on.

Still not working, turn off accessibility services, close the app, reopen the app, turn on accessibility services again.

Final solution: Turn off accessibility services and restart the device.
Avoid being cleaned by the system.
Avoid being cleaned by the system when running for a long time.
Only newly created config settings are valid, saved configs need to be edited in the floating menu.
Is this tutorial helpful to you?
No screenshots for your phone model, can you help us add it?
Auto clicker exits abnormally? Cannot auto click for a long time?
1. It tends to crash when setting intervals below 40 milliseconds. We recommend clicking very fast for a short time.
2. The system will automatically force close the app when power consumption increases suddenly. This can be resolved by setting AUTO START and BATTERY OPTIMIZATION permissions.
3. The above can explain 90% of abnormal exits, and some are related to specific devices and systems. If the above doesn\'t solve your issue, you can restart the app.
Auto clicker exits automatically? Not working?
1. The main reason for this issue is that the ACCESSIBILITY SERVICE has failed. You can:
2. First turn off the Accessibility Service, then turn on the Accessibility Service again; or you can close and restart the app; or restart the device.
Why do I have to reset the accessibility service every time I enter the app?
Android is very strict about permissions, so every time you restart the app, you need to turn on that app again. However, you can fix this by setting up AUTO START.
In Roblox, cannot move screen, etc.
When auto-touching fast, the system cannot recognize human operations, and even if it does, it will cause system errors. You should stop the task before performing operations on the screen.
What should I do if the screen freezes and cannot be turned off?

When you cannot turn off the auto clicker and the phone is not working, you can press the power button to sleep the screen and our auto clicker will automatically pause clicking after the screen sleeps.
Drag the icon to move to the position you want to swipe
Click the icon to collapse and expand the menu bar / Press and hold the icon to drag the menu bar
Drag icon to move to the position you want to click
Drag the edges of the menu bar to move around your screen
Press the edges of the menu bar to change the corner to click, This operation allows you to click anywhere on the screen
When you press the play button, the menu bar will turn green and start clicking for you
When you start clicking, you cannot drag the menu bar and cannot change the click position, you can restore by clicking the stop button.
Clicking the X icon will close the menu bar and stop running clicks
Select the default action to be performed when opening this app
You have no saved configuration to load
The delay interval set between clicks
1. It may cause your device to freeze or exit abnormally.
2. This may cause your device to become uncontrollable.
3. If the device becomes uncontrollable, press the power button and the program will be terminated.
Your trial period begins to take advantage of all the features of the auto clicker.
Your trial period has expired. If you cancel before the end, you will not be charged.
Your account is charged. Your subscription will automatically renew for the same period unless you cancel.

Your annual or monthly subscription will automatically renew for the same period unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. When canceled, your subscription will terminate at the end of the current period. Cancel anytime in Subscriptions on Google Play.
No Google Billing connection detected, please confirm your internet connection and re-enter this page.
Set random delay time between actions
1. During the subscription period, users enjoy VIP services, no ads and no feature restrictions.
2. VIP service is linked to your Google Play account, so you won\'t need to subscribe again when you can replace your phone or reinstall the app after deletion.
3. You will not be charged if the subscription is canceled during the trial period.
4. According to Google Play specifications, if you don\'t cancel your subscription during the subscription period, Google Play will automatically renew your subscription.
5. If you want to cancel your subscription, you can do this through Google Play.
Click intervals below 40 milliseconds may cause your device to freeze or exit abnormally.
